vignette.name: Debugging
vignette.body: Max debugging tools help you monitor patch activity and observe patch execution.

ul.li: Monitor Watchpoints permit you to monitor data flowing through patch cords
The signal probe shows signal values flowing through audio patch cords
The matrix probe shows different aspects of matrix data in Jitter matrix patch cords
You can add data monitoring objects to a patch to observe or capture data
Break Watchpoints stop the execution of a patch at a specific place, permitting you to step through it
The debug window provides information about the current execution "stack"
